statements: SELECT * FROM team_championships;
SELECT team_name, championships_won FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, runner_up_finishes FROM team_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE playoff_appearances > 0 ORDER BY playoff_appearances ASC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, runner_up_finishes, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 3 AND playoff_appearances < 5;
SELECT * FROM team_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, runner_up_finishes FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT * FROM team_championships WHERE playoff_appearances >= 10 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, runner_up_finishes FROM team_championships WHERE runner_up_finishes = 0;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won < 3 AND playoff_appearances > 0 ORDER BY playoff_appearances DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_championships;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, runner_up_finishes FROM team_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, playoff_season, result FROM playoff_history WHERE result = 'Champion';
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5 AND playoff_appearances >= 3;
SELECT team_name, championships_won FROM team_championships WHERE runner_up_finishes = 0 ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5 ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE playoff_appearances > 0 ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, playoffs_season, result FROM playoff_history WHERE team_name LIKE 'Lakers%' ORDER BY playoffs_season DESC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, runner_up_finishes, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won = 0 OR playoff_appearances > 3 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamChampionships;
SELECT team_name, championships_won FROM TeamChampionships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, runner_up_finishes FROM RunnerUpFinishes WHERE runner_up_finishes > 0;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM TeamChampionships JOIN PlayoffAppearances ON TeamChampionships.team_id = PlayoffAppearances.team_id;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM TeamChampionships JOIN PlayoffAppearances ON TeamChampionships.team_id = PlayoffAppearances.team_id WHERE championships_won >= 5;
SELECT team_id, team_name, championships_won FROM TeamChampionships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT team_name, playoff_appearances FROM PlayoffAppearances ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, runner_up_finishes FROM RunnerUpFinishes WHERE runner_up_finishes > 0;
SELECT * FROM TeamChampionships WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT team_name, championships_won, playoff_appearances FROM TeamChampionships JOIN PlayoffAppearances ON TeamChampionships.team_id = PlayoffAppearances.team_id ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC, team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won FROM team_championships WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT team_name, runner_up_finishes FROM team_championships WHERE runner_up_finishes > 0 ORDER BY runner_up_finishes DESC;
SELECT team_name, playoff_appearances FROM team_championships WHERE playoff_appearances BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM playoff_results WHERE playoff_season = '2022' ORDER BY playoff_id ASC;
SELECT team_name, championships_won FROM team_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC, team_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM team_players INNER JOIN team_championships ON team_players.team_id = team_championships.team_id WHERE playoff_appearances > 5;

SELECT playoff_season, team_name AS champion_team, playoff_outcome FROM playoff_results INNER JOIN team_championships ON playoff_results.playoff_champion_team_id = team_championships.team_id INNER JOIN playoff_stats ON playoff_results.playoff_id = playoff_stats.playoff_id WHERE playoff_round = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id, team_name FROM team_championships WHERE runner_up_finishes > 0 ORDER BY team_id DESC;

SELECT player_name, team_name, championships_won, playoff_round FROM team_players INNER JOIN team_championships ON team_players.team_id = team_championships.team_id INNER JOIN playoff_stats ON team_championships.team_id = playoff_stats.team_id WHERE championships_won > 3 AND playoff_round = 2;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, championships, playoff_appearances FROM teams WHERE championships > 5;
SELECT team_name, runner_ups FROM teams ORDER BY runner_ups DESC;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE playoff_appearances = 0;
SELECT * FROM championships WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT team_name, championships, runner_ups, playoff_appearances.result FROM teams JOIN playoff_appearances ON teams.id = playoff_appearances.team_id
SELECT team_name, championships, runner_ups, seasons.end_date FROM teams JOIN seasons ON teams.id = seasons.id

SELECT team_name, championships, runner_ups, playoff_appearances.result, seasons.start_date FROM teams JOIN playoff_appearances ON teams.id = playoff_appearances.team_id JOIN seasons ON teams.id = seasons.id
SELECT team_name, championships, runner_ups, playoff_appearances.result FROM teams WHERE championships > 2
SELECT team_name, championships, runner_ups, playoff_appearances.result FROM teams ORDER BY championships DESC, team_name
